entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • absence d,application #24885
  • FlexLayout inside ScrollView not scrolling correctly on iPhone 8 Plus #24883
  • [regression/8.0.99-ci.net8.24472.1] Invalidate Shadow Issue: VisualElement.Shadow property change no longer invalidates platform shadow #24882
  • IOS Binding Library - the native class hasn't been loaded. #24881
  • Upgrade from 8.0.70 to 8.0.82 Apple reports apple push notifications are being used. #24880
  • AppThemeBinding does not work on ToolbarItems #24878
  • Bump WinAPPSDK to 1.6 #24875
    9.0-rc2
  • Role-based authorization not working correctly when using Blazor WebView in MAUI App #24874
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Unable to run\Debug MAUI Application with net 8 #24868
  • [Windows] CollectionView with grouping fails to add items when a footer template is present or crashes when removing data. #24866
  • Button control: inconsistent border visibility behaviour iOS vs Android when BackgroundColor is Transparent (also with respect to Xamarin.Forms) #24864
  • How to Highlight Arabic text after search with continuity in MAUI #24863
  • Android - picker on hidden page opens after back navigation #24862

Closed

  • APT0003 and other errors with new template #19489
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Focus and blur event get triggered unnecessarily #21841
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Adding value dynamically using parameters to the InputTextarea in the OnBindingContextChanged after some delay, the value not updated properly. #22486
    .NET 9 Planning
  • MAUI blazor form HTML and JS POST DO NOT WORK #24336
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [net9.0] Shift platforms specific code from HybridWebView to the handler using Command Mappers #24269
    9.0-rc2
  • Type binding Error with .NET 9 Preview 6 #23551
    9.0-rc2
  • [Binding SG] Match behavior of compiled bindings with indexers to their counterparts #24255
    9.0-rc2
  • Android page reloading or view issue #24709
  • Android CollectionView loads all Views and locks up UI when soft keyboard shown. #24675
  • Loading initial data from a json file of data 4000 in ObservableCollection is lagging the application to start. #24677
  • Unable to build a brand new .NET MAUI Balzor hybrid App using .NET 8 #24680

PullRequests

Created

  • Update default `BlazorWebView` host address #24884
  • [net9.0] Update rc2 versions #24877
  • [net9.0] Revert "Move HybridWebView platform code to handlers" #24876
  • [iOS] Fix for the CollectionView to prevent duplicate groups or crashes when adding a new item to a group or when adding a new group. #24873
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • FlyoutItemIsVisible property in Shell Items is always true #24871
    community ✨
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #24869
    area-infrastructure
  • [Windows] Fixed CollectionView with grouping fails to add items when a footer template is present or crashes when removing data. #24867
    community ✨
  • Source Generation for XAML #24865

Merged

  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #24870
    area-infrastructure
  • [xaml] fix potential NRE in `{Binding}` #24756
    area-xaml
  • Move HybridWebView platform code to handlers #24479
    area-controls-hybridwebview

Updated

  • [iOS] Text alignment in editor - improvements #24859
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Setting Background to null will update rendering on Android and iOS #24726
    area-theme
  • [macios] Bump .NET 8 to support Xcode 16.0 #24833
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    community ✨
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix memory leak with GroupedItemTemplateCollection #23386
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview
  • Implicitly set SupportedOSPlatformVersion #23857
    9.0-rc2
  • Avoid throwing in async void when applying relative source bindings #24780
    area-xaml
  • Fix ShellContent Title doesn't observe changes to bound properties #24806
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Improve background layer frame mapping performance #24848
    community ✨
  • Fix Provided consistent behavior of text color in tabbed page in all platforms. #24782
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • Relative layout content disappeared when Relative layout has the border with border stroke element. #24841
    community ✨
